item.description:
IMPORTANT *** I change the time to 6:30pm and the venue to the MIT EH&S conference Room (thanks John for offering this space *** We still intend to meet up socially after our presentation and discussion. ***

Java Programmers,
let's talk, Java news. Has anybody looked at Scala or any other new development in Java land?

I look forward to seeing you all.

Our meetings are personal, engaging and everybody is sharing in the topic at hand. Come and share your experience with your peers. Our new venue is "Middlesex Lounge" Cambridge.

Kaj
P.S.: Thank you to the many members that RSVP (one way or another). This helps your humble organizer to manage the crowd at the venue.
item.how_to_find_us: The entrance is a black door to the right of the main Museum entrance. Follow the Meetup signs.
item.why: IMPORTANT *** I change the time to 6:30pm and the venue to the MIT EH&S conference Room (thanks Jhn for offering this space *** We still intend to meet up socially after our presentation and discussion.
item.name: The Boston Java March Meeting
